description.0: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

0.0: Increases CRIT Rate by <cryo>8%</cryo> and increases Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a <cryo>50%</cryo> chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals <cryo>40%</cryo> of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.
